snippet: Palestinian Authority officials say the suspect is the brother of a man killed in a clash with the Palestinian police about a month before the shooting.
abstract: Palestinian Authority officials arrest Nizar Ghawadreh for a shooting at the house of the governor of Jenin, Qadoura Moussa, who died hours later after suffering two heart attacks; Ghawadreh is the brother of a man killed in a clash with the Palestinian police in the village of Bir al-Basha, just outside Jenin, about a month before the attack on the governor’s house.

byline.original: By JODI RUDOREN and KHALED ABU AKER

lead_paragraph: Palestinian Authority officials say the suspect is the brother of a man killed in a clash with the Palestinian police about a month before the shooting.

headline.main: Man Arrested in Shooting in West Bank
headline.print_headline: Man Arrested In Shooting In West Bank
